title: Game is constantly crashing in loading screen
body: Since the latest patch was released, i have been constantly crashing in the loading screens. At the time i am writing this I have been disconnected  5  times in the last day. Now I am really mad because i have been penalized with 20 minute queue times because of the game's bugs. If there is any  way to fix this please let me know.

replies.body:
I found this solution to fix my problem, credit to Volyex
> [{quoted}](name=Volyex,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KoTZJtw7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-06T06:35:54.998+0000)
>
> Ok I fixed it, if this happens to you download Hextech Repair Tool - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool and when installed tick these boxes: https://gyazo.com/658ab47cf11ed2f8e206cd8e8147f25b
> 
> now i just need to wait 20 mins for leaver buster lmao

What kind of crash are you getting exactly?  Is it a bugsplat?  What are you seeing when the loading screen is supposed to appear?  Let me know, but in the meantime I suggest sticking to custom games until things are worked out!

I am having the same problem right now. Bugsplat at load screen, client sign in and champ select work fine. This problem occurs on both the alpha client and legacy client. Troubleshooting "a full repair" has not helped.
